content: stable enough potting soil this is the description of the potting soil as i made it for an ordinary 7 5 cm approx 3 inches diameter terracotta flowerpot but the size of the whole depends very much on the thickness of the wool and the crochet hook you use and whether you crochet tight or loose i used regular crochet cotton esra from zeeman and a 2 5 hook b/c in usa that is slightly thinner than the label indicates but especially for potting soil i think it is better if the crochet is so sturdy that no filling material can be seen through but with your way of crocheting and your material it may just be that this pattern is too big or too small keep checking if it fits and start decreasing earlier or later if necessary 1 crochet 6 single_crochet in a magic_ring 2 crochet 2
